description.html:
• 2 oz ramekins are styled with an Asian flare
  • Their heavy weight design has the look and feel of ceramic or glass
  • Ramekins are stackable and can be used for wasabi, ginger, or a variety of dipping sauces
  • Made of sturdy, break-resistant melamine
  • Dishwasher safe
  • NSF Listed
  • Safe for temperatures up to 212Â°F
  • Pack of 48
